text: Dark Souls III is a 2016 action role-playing game developed by FromSoftware and published by Bandai Namco Entertainment. It is the third game in the Dark Souls trilogy. == Gameplay == Its gameplay is more or less the same as its predecessors, this time the mana mechanic has been returned from Demon's Souls as "Focus Points." == Related pages == * Bloodborne * Demon's Souls Category:2016 video games Category:Dark Souls Category:Bandai Namco games Category:PlayStation 4 games Category:Soulslike video games Category:Video game sequels Category:Video games about death Category:Video games developed in Japan Category:Windows games Category:Xbox One games
title: Dark Souls III
